text: Theodoros Mitras (14 May 1948 - 12 January 2021) was a Greek politician and lawyer. He was born in Katerini, Greece. He was a member of the New Democracy Party. Mitras was a member of the Hellenic Parliament from 1993 to 1996. Mitras died on 12 January 2021 in Thessaloniki, Greece at the age of 72.Εφυγε από τη ζωή ο πρώην βουλευτής της Νέας Δημοκρατίας Θεόδωρος Μήτρας ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Greek politicians Category:Greek lawyers
title: Theodoros Mitras
